rules_text:
Whenever a Phoenix you control dies, create a tapped 2/2 white Bird creature token.
{2}{R}: Target Bird is a Phoenix in addition to its other types. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]It is man's belief in his own primacy that blinds him to his physical condition of his vessel and the truth of its tyranny.[/i]
